result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Elijah L. Jones

records.addlTxt:
Cases called at 9:45 AM:  22CF790, 22CF1212, 22CM226, 22CM296, 22CM752.
Defendant Elijah L. Jones in court with Attorney Francis Rivard.  Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for State of Wisconsin. 
22CF1212: Defendant waives reading of Complaint. Waiver of Preliminary Hearings in 22CF790 and 22CF1212.
Branch 5 to schedule further proceedings.

Cases called at 3:14 PM: 22CF790, 22CM226, 22CM296, 22CM75.  
Defendant Elijah L. Jones in court without counsel. Attorney Trenton Piltz in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court notes the warrant is cancelled and will not be signed.
All matters adjourned to 11/3/22 at 9:30 AM for the Defendant to appear with Attorney Rivard.
Return on warrant on November 2, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

Judge John Manydeeds for Branch 1 intake. 
(Cases 22CF1212, 22CF790, 22CM752, 22CM296, 22CM226 are called at 10:19 AM) No appearance by Defendant Elijah L. Jones in court or by Zoom. Attorney Francis Rivard appears for Elijah L. Jones. Prosecuting attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
No information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. State requests warrant. 
Court orders warrant effective 11/07/2022 at 12:00 PM.

9:40 AM cases 22CM752, 22CF790, 22CM226, 22CM296 called. Defendant Elijah L. Jones in court.  Prosecuting attorney Afton Brianna Lewis Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Francis Rivard appears on behalf of the defendant. Defense waives reading of the complaint and time limits for the preliminary hearing in new files. 
All files: Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 10-10-22 at 1:15 pm.
Hearing scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Cases called at 10:00 AM: 22CF790, 22CM752, 22CM226, 22CM296.
Elijah L. Jones not in court.  Attorney Francis Rivard appeared in court for Elijah L. Jones. Prosecuting Attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Rivard has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. 
Initial Appearance/ RTN adjourned to 9/14/22 at 9:30 AM.

10:44 AM 22CM226 & 22CM296 Prosecuting attorney Trenton John Piltz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Elijah L. Jones in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Elijah L. Jones. Attorney Rivard just received discovery and would like a new date.
Hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.
